_comment: Example configuration file for pair-review. Copy to ~/.pair-review/config.json and modify as needed.

providers._comment: Provider configurations override built-in defaults. Most providers have built-in models, but OpenCode and Pi require manual configuration.

opencode._comment: OpenCode has NO built-in models - you MUST configure models here to use it.

models.description: Fast and capable for most reviews

models.description: OpenAI's latest model for deep analysis

claude._comment: Override Claude's built-in configuration. Useful for custom paths, wrapper scripts, or additional arguments. Built-in models include haiku, sonnet, opus-4.5, opus-4.6-low, opus-4.6-medium, opus, and opus-4.6-1m. Use 'cli_model' to decouple the app-level model ID from the CLI --model argument. Use 'env' for model-specific environment variables.

monorepos._comment: Monorepo configuration. 'path' points to an existing local clone. 'checkout_script' runs in the worktree with env vars: BASE_BRANCH, HEAD_BRANCH, BASE_SHA, HEAD_SHA, PR_NUMBER, WORKTREE_PATH. 'worktree_directory' overrides where worktrees are created. 'worktree_name_template' controls naming with vars: {id} (includes 'pair-review--' prefix, e.g. 'pair-review--abc'), {pr_number}, {repo}, {owner}.
